header.heading: A Node.js application
header.description: A question-and-answer based discussion forum for different communities. Users can create or join a community post questions, answer to other questions, comment on other answers. Users can report other questions and answers.

keypoints: Log in to post a question for others to answer. The question must be under a community
Choose an existing community or create a new one for posting a question. Admin of a community is the one who created that community
A question can also be posted anonymously hiding the poster details
Browse through all the communitites, all questions and answers under any community on 'all communities' page without logging in
Subscribe and unsubscribe to a community
Answer any question in any community
Upvote, downvote, and report any question or answer in any community
Comment under any answer of any community
Admin of a community can see all the reported questions and answers under his community and delete any if he wants to
Posted questions, posted answers, subscribed communities, and created communities of a user are displayed on the account page

header.heading: Fullstack Next.js application
header.description: An application to store passwords, documents, cards, notes, and events. All the confidential details like passwords and credit and debit card details are encrypted and only visible to the user.

keypoints: User can login with their credentials and store their important documents, passwords, card details, make notes, and add events
All the personal information like card details and password are well encrypted and can only be viewed by the respective user
User can add, edit or delete any of their stored details
User can search within the all the pages of the application using the search bar
This application is fully responsive. So, user can be access this application from anywhere in any device
Use Below Credentials to test the application
Username - test@test.com
Password - test123

header.heading: A Static Next.js application
header.description: An application with technical puzzles mostly related to web development and coding supposed to be solved only by developers.

keypoints: No need to login to use this website
It contains multiple puzzles to solve
It can be solved with the basic understanding of web development and DSA
Some puzzles are linked, and would require hints from other puzzles. Best approach is to go sequentially.

header.heading: Fullstack Next.js application
header.description: A platform to post ads for roommates and rooms. Others can search and go through ads according to their requirements and contact the poster.

keypoints: Users can search for roommates or roomies looking for a room for both shared and private
User need to login to contact for an ad. Browsing can be done without logging in
User can post ad for roomate or a rental by signing in and filling the respective form
Search can be sorted and filtered to get more precise results
A contact form is provided in case of any questions or concerns about the site that goes directly to admin inbox
Any ad can be reported inappropriate or saved to favourites
User is provided with a profile section. User can see all the reported and favourite ads in the ptofile section. The profile section can be updated by the user

header.heading: A Static Next.js application
header.description: A digital portfolio for a web agency that provides multiple services like web and app development.

keypoints: This is a simple static portfolio for a web agency
Multiple sections are provided showcasing the work, about, and services offered by the company
User can submit the form on contact us page to get in touch with the company
